question: Which one of the CYP450 enzymes is the second most frequently implicated in the metabolism of the drugs currently available on the market?
ideal_answer: CYP3A4 and CYP2D6 are the most relevant since they metabolize about 50% and 30% of the drugs on the market, respectively.

snippets.text: Among CYP enzymes, CYP3A4 and CYP2D6 are the most relevant since they metabolize about 50% and 30% of the drugs on the market, respectively.
